tags.name: web
tags.description: Endpoints used by the Flutter Web app to minimize api calls.

tags.name: administration
tags.description: Endpoints to be used by the admins to perform mass updates.

get.summary: Returns all house codes that is visible to the user.

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level to access this endpoint.

get.summary: Return the house code for the provided id and the house model if present

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Code for the join house code

415.description: The provided house code id does not match any code.

426.description: The provided id was not in a supported format.

post.summary: Refresh the code field in the House Code models and generate a new dynamic link for it. If provided with an id in the body, this will only refresh the token on that House Code.

requestBody.description: Optional field to only refresh a single House Code

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level to access this endpoint.

415.description: The provided house code id does not match any code.

426.description: The provided id was not in a supported format.

get.summary: Returns the user's overall house rank and semester rank.

200.description: A JSON object with the user's house rank and semester rank

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permissions. Non competition participants can not get a rank.

post.summary: After a FirebaseUser account has been created, this will create the user model in the database

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The user provided house code that will connect a user with a house

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

get.summary: Search for a user whose last name starts with the provided term. This is an endpoint for Professional staff only.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The begining of the last name of the user to find.

parameters.name: previousName
parameters.description: The last name of the last resident returned in the previous request to support pagination.

400.description: User who made the request does not exist

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level to access this endpoint.

426.description: Invalid Data Format. Make sure Strings are not null or empty.

requestBody.description: Parameters to update the user. If an id is not provided, it will update the current user's information. Otherwise, it will use the provided id to update a user. A resident can only update the first and last name. RHP's can do that and update the house and floor id. Professional staff can update those and the permission level.

400.description: The calling user doesnt exist or the user with the given id doesn't exist.

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level to access this endpoint.

425.description: The house provided does not exist.

426.description: Invalid Data Format. Make sure Strings are not null or empty and numbers are not negative. Permission Level must be in the correct range.

428.description: The provided floor id does not exist for the house.

get.summary: Get the user model for the provided Firebase Token.

200.description: User that corresponds to the Firebase Token

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

get.summary: Get submitted point logs for the user

403.description: Invalid Permission Level. Only Residents, RHPs, and Privileged Residents can get points

post.summary: Give a Points Per Resident award to the house specified. This is only for Professional staff

requestBody.description: Fields to give award to a house

description.example: First Place in the Summer Competition

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm The Token Is Valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level. Only Residents, RHPs, and Privileged Residents can get points

post.summary: Request a confirmation email sent to the user's account that contains information on how to save the current points total for all users. This can only be performed by an REA/REC.

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm the token is valid.

409.description: User does not have sufficient permissions to perform this action.

post.summary: Request a confirmation email sent to the user's account that contains information on how to reset the house competition. This will delete all submitted points, delete all QR codes, delete all users, and reset house scores. This can only be performed by an REA/REC.

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm the token is valid.

409.description: User does not have sufficient permissions to perform this action.

get.summary: Endpoint for Professional Staff and RHPs to view the history of submissions in their house.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Search term used for finding point submissions for users with the given last name. Required if the search type is 'user'.

parameters.name: point_type_id
parameters.description: Id for the point type to get submissions for. (Only applies when the type is 'point_type'. This will only find point submissions which were handled.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Defines the date to get point submissions that occurred on or before. (Only applies when the type is 'recent'.)

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Oldest date returned in the previous query. This is used for pagination.

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm the token is valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level

423.description: Could not interpret the provided date

425.description: The provided house name is incorrect.

426.description: At least one of the parameters you provided was in an incorrect format.

get.summary: For an RA, get all unhandled points for your house

401.description: Unauthorized: Confirm the token is valid.

403.description: Invalid Permission Level

425.description: This error should never be returned, but it could. If you ever get this, please report it as a bug and the user that you tried to access it with.
